description:
Tube Optimizer Journey is a 6 module training course with 9 step by step video lessons combining short Powerpoint presentations, LIVE demos and backlinking resources.

The ultimate goal of this course is to help ALL entrepreneurs conquer their fear of video marketing by getting them up to speed on the core foundations of Video SEO (VSEO) marketing for Youtube.

Here's exactly what you get & how each lesson will help you:

Market research pulse (13:54)
After completing this lesson you will no longer have to actively search for content to use in your videos (Watch The Video Above).

Keyword research espionage (09:25)
You will know how to analyze the traffic of your competitors and use THEIR best keywords for your video campaigns.

Video foundation setup 1/2 (19:32)
After finishing this lesson you will know how to create and setup your very own optimized Youtube channel with branding in mind for the long haul.

Video foundation setup 2/2 (10:48)
On completion of this lesson you will know the exact steps which need to be taken to creating a Youtube partner channel to get clickable links IN your videos.

Video pre-optimization 1/2 (04:27)
You will learn how to optimize your videos before uploading them to Youtube. You will need a PC or Mac using Parallels to perform this step.

Video pre-optimization 2/2 (03:26)
You will know the subtle but paramount difference between bad and good optimized video names with examples of each.

Video post optimization 1/2 (12:58)
You will discover the 5 step video optimization checklist needed to optimize videos on Youtube.

Video post optimization 2/2 (04:14)
You will understand closed captions, why they are so important and how to quickly set them up for your videos.

Video CTR optimization (09:30)
You will know how to optimize the click through rate (CTR) of your video links with spotlights and learn the importance of video outtros.

*NEW* Resources Just Added:
a) (PDF) 6 page case study report teaching you which backlinks to use for better Youtube/Google rankings / How to get organic likes, shares, views and subscribers for $0.

b) Closed Facebook group to ask questions.
title: Tube Optimizer Journey: Your Quick Journey To Master Youtube
